title: 01/15/21 DPS Hour 2 Steve Sarkisian and Michele Tafoya
itunes:title: 01/15/21 DPS Hour 2 Steve Sarkisian and Michele Tafoya
description:
Steve Sarkisian tells Dan how he plans to out recruit Nick Saban now that he is the new head coach at Texas. Michele Tafoya tells Dan about the worse weather she is ever worked in.
